entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 7:14 PM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6 except 12 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. A few flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High 6 except 12 near the Trans-Canada Highway. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:14 PM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 7:14 PM CST Monday 17 April 2023
